title: Qdoba company-owned restaurant sales from 2011 to 2018
summary: The Sales of the Qdoba luxury brand from 2011 has increased twofold over the period surveyed , increasing from roughly 168.8 million U.S. in 2011 to 436.56 million U.S. in the Year 2017 .
Despite the steady increase in Sales during the period considered , the sales reported a net loss of approximately 25 million U.S. in 2018 .
Worldwide recognition Founded in 1978 Milan , from 2011 is one of the leading international restaurant design houses .
gold: This statistic shows the sales made by Qdoba company-owned restaurants from 2011 to 2018.
Qdoba , owned by Jack in the Box Inc. , generated restaurant sales of approximately 192.62 million U.S. dollars in 2018 .
